name: Mandiant Threat Intelligence
description: Provides automated access to indicators of compromise (IOCs), CVE information, as well as information on threat actor names from the Mandiant Threat Intelligence API.

options.name: Mandiant URL
options.description: The URL for the Mandiant Threat Intelligence V4 API.  Defaults to `https://api.intelligence.mandiant.com`. Leave empty if your keys are not compatible with this API version.

options.name: Public Key
options.description: Your Mandiant Threat Intelligence API public key

options.name: Private Key
options.description: Your Mandiant Threat Intelligence API private key.

options.name: Minimum ThreatScore to Display
options.description: The minimum ThreatScore (0-100) required for indicators to be displayed [default is 60].  Indicators with a ThreatScore above 60 are considered malicious.

options.name: Enable Threat Actor Search
options.description: If checked, the integration will search threat actors by name.

options.name: Get Threat Actor associated Attack Patterns and Reports
options.description: If checked, the integration will get associated Attack Patterns and Reports by found Threat Actors in `Threat Actors` and `Search` Tabs.

options.name: Vulnerability Rating Sources
options.description: Only return results for Vulnerabilities that come from the Rating Sources selected here.

options.name: Search Results Type
options.description: Search Results returns for Indicators, Malware, Reports, Threat Actors, and Vulnerabilities. Use this to limit the Search Results to just one specific Type, `All` types, or disable the Search Results with `None`.

options.name: Ignored Entities
options.description: Comma separated list of entities that you never want looked up. Should be set to "Only admins can view and edit".

options.name: Ignored Domains Regex
options.description: Domains that match the given regex will not be looked up (if blank, no domains will be black listed).  Should be set to "Only admins can view and edit".

options.name: Max Concurrent Requests
options.description: Maximum number of concurrent requests.  Integration must be restarted after changing this option. Defaults to 20.

options.name: Minimum Time Between Lookups
options.description: Minimum amount of time in milliseconds between lookups. Integration must be restarted after changing this option. Defaults to 100.
